1.name: Veteran Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.

1.name: Ace In The Hole
1.description: Deal 20% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.
1.longDescription: Deal 20% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

1.name: Exterminator
1.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

4.name: Fight or Flight
4.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Sustaining Rounds
4.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.
4.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

4.name: Behemoth Armor
4.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health. Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

7.name: Fuel The Rush
7.description: While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.
7.longDescription: While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

7.name: Unstable Compound
7.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.50 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Heavy Slugs
7.description: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6.00 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 69 damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 826 damage.
10.longDescription: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

10.name: Raynor's Raider
10.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 87 damage per second and regenerates 78 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 damage per second and regenerates 75 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

13.name: Debilitating Rounds
13.description: Decrease the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.
13.longDescription: Decrease the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

13.name: Rallying Cry
13.description: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.
13.longDescription: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

13.name: Giddy-Up
13.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 10% more Movement Speed.
13.longDescription: Gain 10% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 10% more Movement Speed.

16.name: Paint Them Red
16.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 100% of the damage it deals to Heroes.
16.longDescription: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 100% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

16.name: Give Me More!
16.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.
16.longDescription: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Bounty Hunter
16.description: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3.00% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 5 Armor for 3 seconds. Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.
16.longDescription: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 5 Armor for 3 seconds.  Active Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

20.name: Indomitable Resolve
20.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Dusk Wing
20.description: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.
20.longDescription: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

20.name: Weak Spot Acquired
20.description: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

20.name: Execute
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.
20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

abilities.name: Give 'Em Some Pepper
abilities.description: Every 4th Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals 125% more damage to the primary target.

abilities.name: Penetrating Round
abilities.description: Deals 220 (+4% per level) damage, knock back, and Slow enemies in a line for 20% for 2 seconds. Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain 30% Attack Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Heal Raynor for 25% of his maximum Health over 1 second. Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by 0.5 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

abilities.name: Hyperion
abilities.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.Hyperion shoots once per second and Yamato Cannon once per 4 seconds.Hyperion grants vision over the area.

abilities.name: Raynor's Raider
abilities.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.The Banshee Hearths back to the base with Raynor.

1.name: Greed
1.description: Increase the time Minions will grant Annihilation from 1.5 to 3 seconds. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation's range is increased by 33% and it deals 20% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.
1.longDescription: Increase the time Minions will grant Annihilation from 1.5 to 3 seconds. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation's range is increased by 33% and it deals 20% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

1.name: Gluttony
1.description: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

1.name: Wrath
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by the amount of Annihilation he has.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by the amount of Annihilation he has.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

4.name: Hellforged Armor
4.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 30 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.
4.longDescription: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 30 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.

4.name: Battleborn
4.description: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 second.

7.name: Art of Chaos
7.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 30 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.
7.longDescription: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 30 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

7.name: Bombardment
7.description: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 2.00 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.
7.longDescription: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 2 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

7.name: Master of Destruction
7.description: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 2 Annihilation per Hero hit.
7.longDescription: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 2 Annihilation per Hero hit.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 68 damage per impact. Grunts deal 44 damage, have 780 health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 101 damage to nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 damage, have 750 health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 damage to nearby enemies.

10.name: Tide of Sin
10.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.

13.name: Brutish Vanguard
13.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.
13.longDescription: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

13.name: Cydaea's Kiss
13.description: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

13.name: Chain of Command
13.description: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.
13.longDescription: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

16.name: Total Annihilation
16.description: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 5% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Hell Rift
16.description: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 6 seconds.
16.longDescription: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 6 seconds.

16.name: Sin's Grasp
16.description: Increases the range of All Shall Burn by 20%. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.
16.longDescription: Increases the range of All Shall Burn by 20%. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

20.name: Siegebreaker
20.description: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.
20.longDescription: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

20.name: Black Pool
20.description: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 58 damage per second.
20.longDescription: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 per second, up to 56 damage per second.

20.name: Pride
20.description: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 125 additional damage.
20.longDescription: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 125 additional damage.

20.name: Trample
20.description: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 250 damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1.00 second.
20.longDescription: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 240 damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1 second.

abilities.name: Demon Lieutenant
abilities.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at any allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan Demon. The Lieutenant will cast Demonic Smite every 7 seconds, instantly killing an enemy Minion. abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 192 damage on impact.❢  Quest: Hitting a Hero or killing a Minion within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation grants 2 Annihilation.❢ Reward: Each stack of Annihilation increases Globe of Annihilation’s damage by 1, up to 400.Type: Damage / Bonus damage (quest)Scaling: 3.00% / -Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Self-castableCast time: 0.5625+0.125 secondsRange: 30Radius: 4

1.name: Thunderstroke
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

1.name: Seraph's Hymn
1.description: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Blinding Light by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100.00% more damage.
1.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Blinding Light by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100% more damage.

1.name: Charged Strikes
1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

4.name: Inner Light
4.description: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.This effect has a 6 second cooldown.Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.
4.longDescription:
Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.  This effect has a 6 second cooldown. 
Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

4.name: Ring of the Leech
4.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.
4.longDescription: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

4.name: Plate of the Whale
4.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.
4.longDescription: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

7.name: Impale
7.description: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.
7.longDescription: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

7.name: War Traveler
7.description: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.50 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.
7.longDescription: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

7.name: Surge of Light
7.description: After taking 520 damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 234 damage to enemies around her.
7.longDescription: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 225 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

10.name: Ball Lightning
10.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 187 damage to enemies hit.
10.longDescription: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 234 damage and Stunning them for 0.50 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.
10.longDescription: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: Grounding Bolt
13.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.50 seconds.
13.longDescription: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Thundergod's Vigor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1.00 second.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Lunging Strike
13.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.50 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Pierce
16.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.
16.longDescription: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

16.name: Penetrate
16.description: Enemies take 3.0% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.
16.longDescription: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

16.name: Martial Law
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3.0% of the Hero's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.
20.longDescription: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

20.name: Imprisoning Light
20.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 208 damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titan's Revenge
20.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.0.
20.longDescription: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

abilities.name: Avoidance (Trait)
abilities.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 40 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 40%.

abilities.name: Lightning Fury
abilities.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their path.These two bolts do not hit the enemy hit by the javelin.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage and Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

abilities.name: Fend
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes Actually deals ticks of 39 damage every 0.125 seconds to a total of 12 ticks over it's durationMaximum damage with untalented Fend is 468 (+4% per level).Cannot charge at Structures, though the area damage applies to them.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.Prioritises enemy heroes and only bounces back to Cassia, if there are no enemy heroes in its bounce rangeBall Lightning going through Cassia counsumes a bounce normally.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

1.name: Way of Illusion
1.description: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

1.name: Way of the Blade
1.description: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.
1.longDescription: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.

1.name: Way of the Wind
1.description: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.
1.longDescription: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.

4.name: Mirage
4.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.
4.longDescription: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

4.name: One With The Wind
4.description: While Samuro has Wind Walk and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.
4.longDescription: While Samuro has Wind Walk and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

4.name: Deflection
4.description: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images 30 Physical Armor.
4.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants 30 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 25%.

7.name: Burning Blade
7.description: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.
7.longDescription: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 50% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7.name: Phantom Pain
7.description: Samuro's Critical Strikes deal an additional 45% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active.
7.longDescription: Samuro's Critical Strikes deal an additional 45% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active.

7.name: Crushing Blows
7.description: Critical Strike now has 2 charges. Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 1.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Critical Strike now has 2 charges. Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Bladestorm
10.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 244 damage per second to nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Illusion Master
10.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%. Passive: Samuro's Basic Attack damage is increased by 10%, and Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Samuro's Basic Attack damage is increased by 10%, and Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.

13.name: Mirrored Steel
13.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1.00 second.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

13.name: Kawarimi
13.description: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.
13.longDescription: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

13.name: Shukuchi
13.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.
13.longDescription: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

16.name: Merciless Strikes
16.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.
16.longDescription: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

16.name: Harsh Winds
16.description: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30.0% increased damage from Samuro for 3.0 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.

16.name: Press the Attack
16.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10.00% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.
16.longDescription: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

20.name: Dance Of Death
20.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 25% damage.
20.longDescription: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does.

20.name: Three Blade Style
20.description: Samuro's Mirror Images no longer take additional damage, effecively increasing their health by 50% and their duration is increased to 36 seconds.
20.longDescription: Samuro's Images gain an additional 50% of his Health and last up to 36 seconds.

20.name: Wind Strider
20.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

20.name: Blademaster’s Pursuit
20.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15.00% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2.00 seconds.
20.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Image Transmission
abilities.description: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.Affects: Self, ImagesTargeting: Unit TargetCast time: 0+0.125 secondsCast range: 500Samuro can not use Image Transmission on target Image that is Stunned, Silenced, in Stasis or in Time Stop.Using Image Transission to swap between Images puts Samuro and his Images in a special Stasis for 0.125 seconds, when the Ability is being cast, removing debuffs from them and making them briefly untargetable and immune to damage, regardless of which Image was targetted. All of Samuro's Mirror Images' Health is set to match the percentage of Samuro's current Health, when the swap is finished.Using Image Transmission during Wind Walk's Unrevealable period doesn't break Stealth, but using it after Unrevealable period is over will. Real Samuro retains Stealth over the swap.Advancing Strikes Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.Advancing Strikes and the Talents enhancing it work independently on Samuro and each of his Mirror Images.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 9 damage and have 50% of Samuro's current Health. Images last up to 18 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time. Mirror Image will remove most negative effects from Samuro.Type: SummonTargeting: Point TargetClamped: YesCast time: 0+0.125Cast range: 10Displacement: 3.5Mirror ImageSummon type: Heroic Pet / CloneHealth: 50% Attack damage: 9Damage scaling: 4.00%Attack Speed: 100%Attack Range: 100%Movement speed: 100% Sight radius: 100%Samuro appears in the direction of the player's Mouse Cursor, when Mirror Image is cast. Samuro and his Mirror Images spawn in an equilateral triangle around the point where Samuro was standing when the ability was cast.Using Mirror Image puts Samuro in  a special Stasis for 0.125 seconds when the Ability is being cast, removing debuffs from Samuro and making him briefly untargetable and immune to damage.Mirror Images deal the same type of damage than Samuro does.Mirror Images gain all benefits from Samuro's Trait and Talents affecting it.Mirror Images can be affected by Regeneration Globes' healing, but not pick them up themselves. The effect is not shared between Samuro and his Images.Killing Mirror Images rewards no XP or Takedown credit.All Mirror Images are destroyed, when real Samuro successfully Hearths.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 10 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.Type: Damage modifierAffects: Self, ImagesTargeting: No TargetBonus damage from Critical Strike and all Talents enhancing it is dealt in Physical Damage unless otherwise noted.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Enter Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until you attack, use an Ability, or take damage. While Stealthed, your Movement Speed is increased by 25% and you can pass through other units.Samuro is Unrevealable for the first second of Wind Walk.Using Mirror Image and Mounting during Unrevealable period will break Stealth once the period ends.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 damage per second to nearby enemies.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No TargetRadius: 4.25Damage per tick: 47 (x20)Bladestorm can be ended prematurely by reactivating the ability.Samuro can move, but not use any abilities, while Bladestorm is active.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.Passive:Samuro's Basic Attack damage is increased by 10%, and Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.Illusion Master active shares cooldown with Image Transmission, and has all the same properties.Mirror Images have a copy of Illusion Master active and Image Transmission, both of which swap the Image using it with Samuro. The cooldown is shared between Samuro and all his Images.Mirror Images can Mount, Hearth and drink from Healing Fountain. The effect and cooldowns are independent from Samuro and his other Images, including those that have expired.Images can fake capturing Objectives.A Mirror Image Hearthing does not destroy any Mirror Images, but real Samuro Hearthing still does.

1.name: Advanced Targeting
1.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.50, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

1.name: Arsenal Synergy
1.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3.00 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150.00% more damage and splashes in a 50.00% larger area.
1.longDescription: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

1.name: Mobile Offense
1.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35.00% more damage to Heroes.
1.longDescription: After moving unmounted, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

4.name: Target Acquired
4.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10.00% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Inhibiting Energy
4.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes Slowed by Plasma Cutter Slow all enemies in the area by 35% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes Slowed by Plasma Cutter Slow all enemies in the area by 35% for 4 seconds.

4.name: Warp Conduit
4.description: Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.
4.longDescription: Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

4.name: Emergency Protocol
4.description: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25.00% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Combat Advantage
7.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35.00% more damage to Slowed targets.
7.longDescription: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

7.name: Warp Warfare
7.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175.00% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode.
7.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode.

7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
7.description: Activate to instantly drain Shield Capacitor's Shield, but increase Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds proportionate to the amount of Shields drained, up to an 80% increase.
7.longDescription: Activate to instantly drain Shield Capacitor's Shield, but increase Basic Attack damage by 80% of the Shield drained for 5 seconds.

10.name: Purification Salvo
10.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 89 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
10.longDescription: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 86 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

10.name: Planet Cracker
10.description: After 0.50 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4.00 seconds, dealing 116 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 105 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

13.name: Adanium Shell
13.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Dampening Field
13.description: Fenix gains 20 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
13.longDescription: Fenix gains 20 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

13.name: Rapid Recharge
13.description: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60.00% of the healing received.
13.longDescription: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

13.name: Auxiliary Shields
13.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 10% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 20%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10.00% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 10% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 20%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Offensive Cadence
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6.00% of the target's maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Photonic Weaponry
16.description: Fenix deals 15.00% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
16.longDescription: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
16.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Secondary Fire
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.50 seconds, dealing 89 damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 86 damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

20.name: Singularity Charge
20.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.
20.longDescription: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 2.5 more range.

20.name: Unconquered Spirit
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 832 Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

1.name: Echo Pulse
1.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.
1.longDescription: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

1.name: Warp Resonance
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

1.name: Gather Minerals
1.description: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.  Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.
1.longDescription: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560. Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

4.name: Photon Barrier
4.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.
4.longDescription: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

4.name: Turbo Charged
4.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

4.name: Shield Capacitor
4.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.
4.longDescription: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

7.name: Particle Accelerator
7.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.
7.longDescription: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

7.name: Rift Shock
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

7.name: Tower Defense
7.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Pylon Overcharge
10.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 100 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

10.name: Null Gate
10.description: Vector TargetingProject a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 71 damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

13.name: Aggressive Matrix
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

13.name: Power Overflowing
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2.0 Mana per second.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

13.name: Shield Battery
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 29 Shields per second, up to 116. Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 29 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 116 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

16.name: Quantum Entanglement
16.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3.0 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.
16.longDescription: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

16.name: Gravity Well
16.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.
16.longDescription: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

16.name: Repulsor
16.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.
16.longDescription: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

16.name: Interference
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Construct Additional Pylons
20.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.
20.longDescription: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

20.name: Gate Keeper
20.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.
20.longDescription: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

20.name: Shoot 'Em Up
20.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

20.name: Probius Loop
20.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.
20.longDescription: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

abilities.name: Warp In Pylon
abilities.description: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field. Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.

abilities.name: Disruption Pulse
abilities.description: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 (+5% per level) damage to all enemies it passes through. Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Warp Rift
abilities.description: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds. Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 (+5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Photon Cannon
abilities.description: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds. Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field. Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

abilities.name: Pylon Overcharge
abilities.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.Prioritizes Heroes.

abilities.name: Null Gate
abilities.description: Vector Targeting. Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

abilities.name: Worker Rush
abilities.description: Activate to gain an additional 50% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2.0 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20.0 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.
4.longDescription: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.
4.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.
4.longDescription: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2.50 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 seconds per use.
7.longDescription: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 seconds per use.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 10 Mana.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

7.name: Icefury Wand
7.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 75% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 75% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1 second.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 322 damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 64 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increase cast range of Blizzard by 100%.
13.longDescription: Increase cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: Increase the radius of Blizzard by 30%.
16.longDescription: Increase the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 25%.
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Numbing Blast

16.longDescription: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 322 damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Ice Blink
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

20.name: Deep Chill
20.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.
20.longDescription: Frostbite's Chill can now stacks a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Jaina's abilities Chill targets, slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.❢  Quest: Deal 15,000 damage to Chilled enemy Heroes.❢ Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block ability. Activate to place Jaina in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 2.5 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled. 40 second cooldown.Chill is applied after damage is dealt.

20.longDescription: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and getting a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

20.longDescription: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 95 damage to the target, and 237 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

abilities.name: Creep Tumor

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage

abilities.name: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 65 (+5% per level) damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds. Damage dealt by the Hydralisk summon is not reduced by Armor.

abilities.name: Infested Drop
abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 147 (+4% per level) damage. The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 27 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 8 seconds. Damage dealt by the Roach summons is not reduced by Armor.

abilities.name: Devouring Maw
abilities.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

abilities.name: Nydus Network
abilities.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Convection
1.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death. Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death. Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

1.longDescription: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

4.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

7.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.longDescription: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 second.

16.longDescription: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.longDescription: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

abilities.name: Verdant Spheres
abilities.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 345 (+4% per level) damage in an area.Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.Living bomb deals 3 ticks of 42 damage before exploding.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

abilities.name: Pyroblast
abilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.Cast time is a 1.5 second stationary channel.

abilities.name: Phoenix
abilities.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.Phoenix is untargetable and invulnerable and has no collision.Phoenix attacks the nearest enemy to the center, prioritizing Heroes.Phoenix' attacks deal Spell Damage.Phoenix' initial swoop through enemies is affected by Spell Power, but its attacks aren't at any time.Phoenix attacks 13 times during it's duration, dealing total of 1014 damage and 507 splash damage.
