13.description: Gain 20 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 20 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ominous Wraith
13.description: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

16.name: Crushing Hope
16.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.
16.longDescription: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

16.name: Royal Focus
16.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.
16.longDescription: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

16.name: Mithril Mace
16.description: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.
16.longDescription: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

20.name: Buried Alive
20.description: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 52 damage every 1 second.
20.longDescription: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

20.name: Death March
20.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Spectral Leech
20.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.50% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

20.name: Burning Despair
20.description: Deal 42 damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.
20.longDescription: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
20.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.
20.longDescription: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.description: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.Type: Special death stateAffects: SelfProperties: Untargetable by everythingLeoric can use Ghastly Swing (Q), Drain Essence (W) and Hearth and provide vision while Undying. Leoric cannot use other abilities or interact with other units in any other way while Undying, unless otherwise noted.Reaching full health while Undying automatically resurrects at his current location after 1 second. Leoric is still Undying, but unable to act for the duration of the resurrection sequence.Wrath Of The Bone KingLeoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.Type: Attack modifier / Damage modifierAffects: SelfProperties: SplashCleave radius: 3.5Cleave arc: 220 degrees

abilities.name: Skeletal Swing
abilities.description: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SlowCast time: 0.15+0.1875 secondsRadius: 5Arc: 180 degrees

abilities.name: Ghastly Swing
abilities.description: Slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.Type: Non-damagingAffects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SlowCast time: 0.15+0.1875 secondsRadius: 5Arc: 180 degreesDoes not benefit from talents affecting Skeletal Swing.

abilities.name: Drain Hope
abilities.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 4 seconds. Leoric is Slowed by 20% while this is active.Type: Damage / HealingScaling: -Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Percent damage, Skillshot, Self-SlowCast time: 0.15+0 secondsRange: 8Hitbox: 1.25x1.5Tickrate: 2 / second (x8)

abilities.name: Drain Essence
abilities.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.Type: HealingScaling: -Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, SkillshotCast time: 0.15+0 secondsRange: 8Hitbox: 1.25x1.5Tickrate: 2 / second (x8)Does not benefit from talents affecting Drain Hope.

abilities.name: Wraith Walk
abilities.description: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.Type: Mobility: TeleportTargeting: No targetProperties: UnstoppableCast time: InstantReactivate: Cancel Wraith Walk - Cancels Wraith WalkLeoric's ghost is an invulnerable summon that moves at regular Movement speed.Ghost's Movement speed can be affected by conveyor belts in Volskaya Foundry.Unaffected by Roots.Unstoppable is removed before teleporting to ghost.

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.Type: Terrain objectAffects: All unitsTargeting: Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: 0.0625+0.875 secondsInner length: 7Outer length: 8Inner width: 4Outer width: 6.5Delay: 0.1875 seconds

abilities.name: March of the Black King
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 12% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 250 damage.Type: Damage / Healing / Mobility: DashScaling: 4.00% (damage)/ - (healing)Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, UnstoppableCast time: 0+2.5 secondsRange: 8.125Swing radius: 2.5Swing arc: 270 degreesSwings take place at 0.31/1.31/2.31 seconds (or  distancewise at 1/4.25/7.5).

1.name: Boneslicer
1.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.
1.longDescription: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Recklessness
1.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.
1.longDescription: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%

1.name: Headhunter
1.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%. Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.10.
1.longDescription: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%. Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

4.name: Troll's Blood
4.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.
4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
4.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40.00%.
4.longDescription: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

4.name: Amani Hide
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 10 Armor while regenerating Health from it.
4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 10 Armor while you are regenerating Health from it.

7.name: Vicious Assault
7.description: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.
7.longDescription: Increase Grievous Throw's damage bonus by 35% and duration by 3 seconds.

7.name: Arcanite Axes
7.description: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.
7.longDescription: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

7.name: Ferocity
7.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.
7.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

10.name: Taz'dingo!
10.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!
10.longDescription: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 343 damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.
10.longDescription: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

13.name: Lacerate
13.description: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10.00%.
13.longDescription: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ensnare
13.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.50 seconds.
13.longDescription: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: No Mercy!
16.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.
16.longDescription: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
16.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 104 damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.
16.longDescription: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

16.name: Let the Killing Begin
16.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.
20.longDescription: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75.00% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.
20.longDescription: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

20.name: Forest Medicine
20.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
20.longDescription: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.You Want Axe?❢  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.❢ Reward: After attacking 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.❢ Reward: After attacking 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.Continues to gain stacks even after the quests are completed.Bonus damage from You want Axe? is affected by damage multipliers, but not by Scaling.

abilities.name: Amani Rage
abilities.description: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

abilities.name: Twin Cleave
abilities.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 116 damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.Twin Cleave's axes return and revolve from the initial cast location, regardless of where Zul'jin is.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.Damage over Time effects applied before cast do not interrupt Regeneration.

abilities.name: Taz'dingo
abilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

abilities.name: Guillotine
abilities.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.This cannot be interrupted, once cast.Bonus damage is a percentage of the base damage and can be calculated using formula y = x2 / 50 where x stands for percentage of health missing. Maximum bonus damage is 200%.

1.name: Backlash
1.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.
1.longDescription: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Shackler
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

4.name: Reaper's Toll
4.description: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.

4.name: Grim Scythe
4.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1.00 second, up to 12 seconds.
4.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 40% Movement and Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 50% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.
7.longDescription: Cursed Strikes heals for 60% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.name: Weaken
7.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

7.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
7.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.50% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.20% of his maximum Mana.
7.longDescription: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 593 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Vector TargetingSummon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 49 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.
13.longDescription: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

13.name: Rapid Harvest
13.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.name: Executioner
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Amplify Damage
16.description: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

16.name: Corpse Explosion
16.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 57 damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.
16.longDescription: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.description: Deal 239 damage to enemies in a line.
16.longDescription: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.  Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2.00 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.  Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.
20.longDescription: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

abilities.name: Raise Skeleton
abilities.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 255 (+4% per level) Health that attacks for 21 (+4% per level) damage and last up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of your maximum Health for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Spectral Scythe
abilities.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes
abilities.description: Xul's Basic Attack deals damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

abilities.name: Bone Prison
abilities.description: After a 2 seconds delay, deals 80 (+4% per level) damage and roots the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Skeletal Mages
abilities.description: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

1.name: Grenade Calibration
1.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75.00% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit. Reward: After hitting 20.00 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12.00 seconds, its healing radius is increased by 100%, and its healing amplification applies to all sources.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12 seconds, and its healing radius is increased by 100%, and its healing amplification applies to all sources.

1.name: Piercing Darts
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%.

1.name: Detachable Box Magazine
1.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 12 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.
1.longDescription: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 12 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

4.name: Overdose
4.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Sleep Dart applies 3 Doses.
4.longDescription: Hitting enemies with Sleep Dart applies 3 Doses.

4.description: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100.00% and Basic Attack range by 2.00 but reduce Movement Speed by 20.00%. Lasts until canceled.
4.longDescription: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100% and Basic Attack range by 2 but reduce Movement Speed by 20%. Lasts until canceled.

4.name: Air Strike
4.description: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 275% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 3 seconds to land.Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 200% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 3 seconds to land.  Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds.

7.name: Temporary Blindness
7.description: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds.

7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
7.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10.00%.
7.longDescription: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

7.name: Debilitating Dart
7.description: Activate to fire a dart which slows the movement speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50.00% for 3.00 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to fire a dart which slows the movement speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Nano Boost
10.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200.00 Mana. For the next 8.00 seconds, they gain 30.00% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150.00% faster.Cannot be used on Ana.
10.longDescription: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

10.name: Eye of Horus
10.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6.00 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 and enemies are damaged for 166. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.
10.longDescription: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

13.name: Speed Serum
13.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Purifying Darts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

13.name: Smelling Salts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

16.name: Sharpshooter
16.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.
16.longDescription: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% each time it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

16.name: Concentrated Doses
16.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.
16.longDescription: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

16.name: Contact Healing
16.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.
16.longDescription: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Nano Infusion
20.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

20.name: Ballistic Advantage
20.description: Eye of Horus rounds explode upon impacting a Hero, healing nearby allies for 300 and dealing 150 damage to nearby enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: Eye of Horus rounds explodes upon impacting a Hero, healing nearby allies for 300 (+4% per level) and dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Somnolent Doses
20.description: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are put to Sleep for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are put to Sleep for 2 seconds.

20.name: Dynamic Shooting
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.

20.name: Custom Optics
20.description: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2.00 to 4.00.
20.longDescription: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2 to 4.

abilities.name: Shrike
abilities.description: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing an additional 40 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds, and stacking up to 5 times.Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 50% of the damage dealt by Shrike.

abilities.name: Healing Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 215 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Toss a Grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are are healed for 166 (+4% per level) Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 (+4% per level) damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, rendering them unable to act for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds. Cannot be used on Vehicles.

abilities.name: Nano Boost

abilities.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

16.longDescription: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 15%. Stacks up to 15 times.

20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

abilities.name: Ghost Wolf

abilities.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed, and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancestral Healing
abilities.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health. Cannot be used on yourself.

1.longDescription: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.
Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.longDescription: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

7.longDescription: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.longDescription: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 208 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. 
This ability will take over your Trait button.

10.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over your Trait button.

13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

13.longDescription: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds. 
Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Discord Strike

4.longDescription: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

13.longDescription: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.50 seconds.Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.50 seconds.

Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Ethereal Existence

13.longDescription: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

13.name: Inevitable End
13.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2.00 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.
13.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
13.description: After 2.00 seconds, gain 50.00 Spell Armor for 4.00 seconds.
13.longDescription: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

16.name: Soul Collector
16.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.50 seconds and increase its range by 25.00%.
16.longDescription: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

16.name: Mortality
16.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 6.00% of the Hero's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 6% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

20.name: Reaper of Souls
20.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.
20.longDescription: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

20.name: Angel of Death
20.description: Last Rites heals for 100.00% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.
20.longDescription: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

20.name: Final Curtain
20.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4.00 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.
20.longDescription: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

20.name: No One Can Stop Death
20.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25.00%.
20.longDescription: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

abilities.name: Reaper's Mark
abilities.description: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds. Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health every 1 second.Damage inflicted by Reaper's Mark is dealt as Spell Damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 (+4% per level)damage and healing Malthael for 25 (+4% per level) per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.Can only be activated if there is at least one enemy affected by Reaper's Mark.

abilities.name: Wraith Strike
abilities.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.Can only be activated if there is at least one enemy affected by Reaper's Mark.Malthael teleports to the opposite side of the target from his location.

abilities.name: Death Shroud
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

abilities.name: Tormented Souls
abilities.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Last Rites
abilities.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.❢ Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.Enemy Heroes damaged enough to be killed by using this Ability are indicated by a red skull above them provided the Ability is not on cooldown.

1.name: Ambush
1.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
1.longDescription: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.

1.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.
1.longDescription: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 25.25% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

1.name: Maelstrom Rounds
1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

4.longDescription: Concussive Blast creates an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

4.longDescription: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

4.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

7.longDescription: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.

7.longDescription: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

7.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.00 every 3 seconds, up to 3.00.
7.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.

10.name: Blunt Force Gun
10.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 515 damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.
10.longDescription: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

10.longDescription: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.longDescription: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

13.name: Entrenched

13.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

13.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Neosteel Plating grants 5% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Orbital BFG
20.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.
20.longDescription: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
20.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.
20.longDescription: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

20.longDescription: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.

20.longDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

abilities.name: Siege Mode

abilities.name: Spider Mines
abilities.description: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 secondsSiege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

abilities.name: Neosteel Plating
abilities.description: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

abilities.name: Napalm Strike
abilities.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blunt Force Gun
abilities.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Siege Thrusters
abilities.description: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Altar. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.

1.longDescription: Each allied Hero healed by Soothing Mist reduces the cooldown of Phase Shift by 3 seconds.

1.longDescription: Each time Brightwing heals an Allied Hero with Soothing Mist, she gains a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

4.longDescription: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 104 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

7.longDescription: After finishing the teleport, both Brightwing and her target gain a 335 (+4% per level) point Shield for 10 seconds.

7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.longDescription: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 303 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.  Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 5%.

13.longDescription: Enemies hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

13.longDescription: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 1.5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Pixie Dust grants 50 Physical Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Physical damage taken by 50%.

13.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 seconds.

16.longDescription: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.longDescription: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

16.longDescription: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

20.longDescription: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

20.longDescription: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage. Also further increases the healing bonus of Soothing Mist by 7%.

20.longDescription: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Soothing Mist
abilities.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 112 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Deal 260 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and 87 (+4% per level) damage in a larger area.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.description: Polymorph a target for 1.25 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 25% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

abilities.name: Pixie Dust
abilities.description: Increase target's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 25 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 25%.

abilities.name: Blink Heal
abilities.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Emerald Wind
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 303 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 5%.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.

1.name: The Plaguelands
1.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1.00 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

1.name: Blighted Frost
1.description: Frost Nova deals 50% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.50 seconds.
1.longDescription: Frost Nova deals 50% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Chains
1.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 15 for 4.00 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 15 for 4 seconds.

4.name: Strip Shields
4.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 125 Shield, stacking up to 2 times.Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 277 bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.
4.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 120 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
4.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.
4.longDescription: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

4.name: Armor of the Archlich
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4.00 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 47 damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Accelerated Decay
7.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.
7.longDescription: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

7.longDescription: Activate to create a spike that detonates after 4 seconds, dealing 220 (+2.5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.

7.longDescription: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits nearby enemies, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

10.name: Frost Blast

10.longDescription: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Fissure
10.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.50 seconds, dealing 410 damage to enemy Heroes in its area.
10.longDescription: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 400 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

13.name: Icy Grasp
13.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow duration by 2.00 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Frost Nova's Slow duration by 2 seconds.

13.name: Chains of Ice
13.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1.00 second.
13.longDescription: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

13.name: Chain-Link
13.description: Pulling 2 Heroes together with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.
13.longDescription: Pulling two Heroes together with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

16.name: Arcane Echoes
16.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Hungering Cold
16.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Frost Nova take an additional 56 damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad during the next 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies Rooted by Frost Nova take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad during the next 4 seconds.

16.name: Power of Icecrown
16.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Deathchill
20.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.
20.longDescription: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

20.name: Might of the Scourge
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets its cooldown.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets it cooldown.

20.name: Shifting Malice
20.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 154 damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.
20.longDescription: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

20.name: The Damned Return

20.longDescription: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

abilities.name: Master of the Cold Dark
abilities.description: ❢  Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.❢ Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, the cooldown of all Basic Abilities is reduced by 2 seconds.❢ Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.

abilities.name: Death and Decay
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 70 (+2.5% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

abilities.name: Frost Nova
abilities.description: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 212 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

abilities.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
abilities.description: Launch a chain, dealing 97 (+2.5% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero or Structure hit. For 4 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains of Kel’Thuzad can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.Chain is launched from primary target towards target point on reactivation.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 (+2.5% per level)  damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level)  damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frozen Tomb are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Fissure
abilities.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 400 (+2.5% per level)  damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

1.name: Lion's Maw

1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

1.longDescription: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.

4.name: Taunt

4.longDescription: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%.

4.name: Colossus Smash

16.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.
16.longDescription: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
20.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.
20.longDescription: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

20.name: Checkpoint Reached
20.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.
20.longDescription: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.name: The Sequel!
20.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 43 damage to the target, and 109 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 43 damage to the target, and 109 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

abilities.name: Viking Hoard
abilities.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.

abilities.name: Select Olaf
abilities.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown. Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Select Baelog
abilities.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

abilities.name: Select Erik
abilities.description: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

abilities.name: Select All Vikings
abilities.description: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

abilities.name: Play Again!
abilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

abilities.name: Longboat Raid!
abilities.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 245 (36 + 11 per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 450 (70 + 20 per level) damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

abilities.name: Go Go Go!
abilities.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.
1.longDescription: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%. Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.
1.longDescription: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%. Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Rime
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second. Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.50 seconds against enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second. Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.description: Gain 3.00% Attack Speed for 1.500 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60.000%.
4.longDescription: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.
4.longDescription: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50.00% bonus healing.
7.longDescription: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3.0 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15.0 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 278 Health.
10.longDescription: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 239 damage and slows enemies by 60.0% for 4.0 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20.00 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.50% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.
13.longDescription: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Damage slows targets Movement and Attack Speeds by 5% for 1.5 seconds. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.
16.longDescription: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.
16.longDescription: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.
20.longDescription: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.
20.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.
20.longDescription: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

10.longDescription: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.longDescription: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.longDescription: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Whirlwind deals an additional 50% damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

13.name: No Escape

13.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

16.longDescription: Seismic Slam deals an additional 2% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage.

16.description: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.description: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.name: Arreat Crater

20.longDescription: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.longDescription: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

20.longDescription: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

20.longDescription: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

4.longDescription: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

4.longDescription: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

7.longDescription: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.longDescription: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

10.name: Gargantuan

10.longDescription: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

10.longDescription: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 207 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.longDescription: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities. Basic Attacks from enemy Heroes remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

16.longDescription: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

20.longDescription: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

20.longDescription: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

20.longDescription: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual. Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 150%.

If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains 6 Health and 1 Mana.The Damage over Time effect does not stack.

Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all of Kharazim's Basic Abilities by 1.75 second.

4.name: Spirit Ally

4.longDescription: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allies in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

4.longDescription: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

4.longDescription: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 75 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.longDescription: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.

7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

10.longDescription: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1141 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

10.longDescription: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

13.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increases Deadly Reach's duration by 100%.

13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.longDescription: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

16.longDescription: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 75% for 3 seconds.

20.longDescription: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.longDescription: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.longDescription: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

abilities.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.In order to receive bonuses from Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight, the Basic Attacks should hit enemies within 3 seconds from each other, or the counter resets.

abilities.name: Radiant Dash

1.longDescription: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Vindication's healing is increased by 20% per enemy Hero hit.

7.longDescription: While above 50% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

10.longDescription: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 40 Armor until she leaves the area.

16.longDescription: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 4% of their Maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.

If Yrel is interrupted during channeling a Basic Ability, it goes on full cooldown without firing off.

4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

4.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Maelstrom Weapon

Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.
7.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

7.longDescription: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

13.longDescription: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

16.longDescription: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.
16.longDescription: Casting Chain Lightning on a Hero other than the last Hero it was cast on causes it to Slow targets by 8% for 2 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Each consecutive cast against a new Hero increases this bonus by 8%, up to 40%. Bonuses are reset if Thrall dies or casts Chain Lightning on the same Hero twice. Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.

16.longDescription: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage to each enemy hit.Targets of secondary bounces are chosen at random from all units in range.Each unit can only be damaged once per cast.

Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.Cast is uninterruptable.Only grants Frostwolf Resilience stacks from Heroes.

4.longDescription: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

7.name: Coming Through

7.longDescription: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

7.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

10.name: Bunny Hop

10.longDescription: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Big Shot
10.description: Deal 260 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.Requires Pilot Mode.
10.longDescription: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

13.name: Expensive Plating
13.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.
13.longDescription: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

13.name: Emergency Shielding
13.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 218 damage over 6 seconds.This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

13.name: Ablative Armor
13.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health is reduced by 50%.This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.
13.longDescription: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health are reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

16.name: Torpedo Dash

16.longDescription: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

16.name: GG, WP
