16.longDescription: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

16.name: Nanoweave Suit

16.longDescription: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

16.name: Suppressing Fire
16.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Stop and Pop
20.description: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.
20.longDescription: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
20.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.50 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.
20.longDescription: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

20.name: Concussive Pulse
20.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 147 damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.Requires Pilot Mode.
20.longDescription: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

20.name: MEKAfall
20.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 210 damage to enemies in the impact area.
20.longDescription: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

abilities.name: Mech Mode
abilities.description: When D.Va's Mech is destroyed, she is ejected after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight in Pilot Mode. Destroying D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP.Attack area length: 3.75Attack area width: 2The Mech's movement speed is 85%.D.Va can attack while moving and her Basic Attacks hit all enemies in an area in front of her while in Mech Mode.

abilities.name: Pilot Mode
abilities.description: Each Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP upon death.

abilities.name: Boosters (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Increases D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away.D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.Type: Damage / Mobility: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Knockback, Mobile channel, Movement Speed buffCast time: InstantKnockback distance: 2Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsReactivate: Cancel Boosters - Cancels BoostersThe movement speed during Boosters is calculated after the 100% baseline, and therefore is 225%, instead of 210%.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.Damage dealt to the Mech by enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.Type: Damage modifier: DebuffScaling: -Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Mobile channelCast time: 0.125+0 secondsOffset range: 0.5Lenght: 6.5Inner width: 2Outer width: 6REactivate: Cancel Defense Matrix - Cancels Defense Matrix.Once cast the direction D.Va is facing is locked, but is otherwise able to move freely.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1200 damage in a large area, depending on distance from the center of the blast. Deals 50% damage against Structures.Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent using Basic Attacks, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, KnockbackCast time: InstantInner radius: 4Mid radius: 7Outer radius: 10Knockback distance: 3Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsExplosion deals 1200 damage to enemies within inner radius, 800 damage to enemies within mid radius or 400 damage to enemies within the rest of the AoE.Can be activated while Boosters are active, and Boosters can be deactivated after leaving the Mech.If Mech has taken fatal damage Self-Destruct can not be used, unless Boosters are active.Successfully casting Self-Destruct reduces Call Mech's cooldown to 4 seconds and turns D.Va's Mech into an Unkillable Heroic Pet.Ejected Mech can be affected by Crowd Control, including Polymorph, and Stasis effects like Stitches' Gorge.Crowd Control effects neither delay nor suppress Mech's explosion, they can only affect its position. The explosion can only be delayed by the Time Stop effect.Using Self-Destruct to eject from the Mech awards no experience to enemies.Attacking multiple targets at the same time does not increase charge gained.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode. Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. 45 second cooldown. While in Pilot Mode, each Basic Attack lowers this cooldown by 0.5 seconds.Type: -Scaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Cast time: 0.5+0 secondsEntering the Mech successfully fully heals D.Va's pilot form and removes most debuffs.Interruoting Call Mech during it's cast puts it on a 4-second cooldown.

abilities.name: Bunny Hop
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode.  D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Mobile channel, Unstoppable, SlowCast time: InstantRadius: 5Reactivate: Cancel Bunny Hop - Cancels Bunny Hop

abilities.name: Big Shot
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode.  Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. Call Mech's cooldown is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast, ClampingCast time: 0.5+0 secondsRange: 15Width: 1.5

abilities.name: Fresh Meat
abilities.description: Upon dying nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 bonus Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.❢  Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.❢ Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh meat is no longer lost on death.Bonus damage from Fresh Meat is affected by damage multiplication, but not by Scaling.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds. The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.description: Deal 37 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done.Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.Cannot be applied to Structures.Healing is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage modifications.

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are Stunned for 1 second and take 119 (+4% per level) damage.Cannot target Structures.Charge can be manually cancelled by reactivating the ability.Charge is automaitcally cancelled, if it has been active for 4 seconds without hitting the target or if the target becomes untargetable.

abilities.name: Furnace Blast
abilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.Chained enemies will be pulled towards the center, if they try to escape the area.

7.longDescription: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

7.longDescription: Noxious Blossom deals 75% more damage to Heroes afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 125% against enemies with 3 stacks.

7.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

abilities.name: Nature's Toxin

13.longDescription: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.
13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Frost Shot
16.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Seething Hatred
16.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 35 damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.
20.longDescription: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

20.name: Storm of Vengeance
20.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

20.name: Rancor
20.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.
20.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.name: Farflight Quiver
20.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.20.
20.longDescription: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

abilities.name: Hatred
abilities.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 172 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 second deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.Strafe targets up to 3 enemies closest to Valla that she has "line of sight" on and fires a bolt at one of them every 0.125 seconds. Strafe can hit the same target only once per 0.3125 seconds.Strafe can deal up to 660 damage to single target, or up to 1980 damage total.

abilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
abilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.Rain of Vengeance has 0.6 second delay before impact.

1.name: Sulfuras Hungers
1.description: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30. Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30. Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

1.name: Shifting Meteor
1.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 3.00% increased damage from it. Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.
1.longDescription: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 3% increased damage from it. Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

1.name: Engulfing Flame
1.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75.00% and its radius by 15%.
1.longDescription: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

4.name: Fire Ward
4.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Armor, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.Stores up to 2 charges.
4.longDescription: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Slow Burn
4.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

4.name: Catching Fire
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

7.name: Hand of Ragnaros
7.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Molten Power
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

7.name: Blistering Attacks
7.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

10.name: Sulfuras Smash
10.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 206 damage. Enemies in the center take 618 damage instead and are Stunned for 0.50 seconds.
10.longDescription: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Lava Wave
10.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 250 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.
10.longDescription: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

13.name: Cauterize Wounds
13.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

13.name: Tempered Flame
13.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

13.name: Resilient Flame
13.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

16.name: Meteor Bomb
16.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 229 damage to all nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Blast Echo
16.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
20.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Lava Surge
20.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Heroic Difficulty
20.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.
20.longDescription: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

20.name: Submerge
20.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 624 Health over 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds. Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.Molten Core has a 2 second cast time.You can exit Molten Core after a 1 second channel by reactivating the Trait. Exiting can be cancelled by pressing the Trait button again before channel is complete.Ragnaros loses 222 (+4% per level) Health per second in Molten Core. Ragnaros is Unstoppable, immune to friendly Abilities and unable to move while in Molten Core.Some Abilities that were cast before entering Molten Core persist such as Auriel's Bestow Hope.Molten Core Ragnaros cannot be healed, but regular Ragnaros can regenerate Health inside Molten Core.Entering Molten Core puts real Ragnaros in a special Stasis, removing most debuffs and making him untargetable and immune to damage until Molten Core ends.Molten Core Ragnaros cannot be targeted or affected by Abathur's Ultimate Evolution, Sylvanas' Black Arrow or Zagara's Devouring Maw.Molten Core Ragnaros interacts as a Hero unit for the purposes of such Abilities and Talents as Tychus' Minigun or Gul'dan's Echoed Corruption.

abilities.name: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.Molten Core: Molten SwingStun and damage nearby enemies.Cooldown starts when the Ability is triggered by attacking an enemy.Empower Sulfuras will miss when Ragnaros is Blinded, and the Ability’s cooldown will be consumed.

abilities.name: Molten Swing
abilities.description: Swing your hammer in a wide arc, dealing moderate damage and stunning enemies for 1 second.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Living Meteor
abilities.description: Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in that target direction dealing 272 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.Molten Core: Meteor ShowerDrop a line of meteor impacts.Meteor can damage enemies multiple times as it rolls.The meteor deals damage every 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Meteor Shower
abilities.description: Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals moderate damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Blast Wave
abilities.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.Molten Core: Explosive RuneCause a delayed explosion in a large area.

abilities.name: Explosive Rune
abilities.description: Create a rune that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing damage to non-Structure enemies in a circular area.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Sulfuras Smash
abilities.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.In Molten Core form, the range is increased to match that of Meteor Shower and Explosive Rune.

abilities.name: Lava Wave
abilities.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

1.name: Feast on Fear
1.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.
1.longDescription: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

1.name: Soul Shield
1.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds.  Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Sacrificial Soul
4.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 20 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 40.
4.longDescription: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 20 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 40.

4.name: Souls to the Flame
4.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.30% of its damage dealt per Soul.
4.longDescription: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

4.name: Life Leech
4.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3.0% of his maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Eternal Flames
7.description: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp.
7.longDescription: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp.

7.name: Malevolence
7.description: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 104 Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 0.75 second.
7.longDescription: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 0.75 second.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 142 damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 52 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%. Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 80%. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase this bonus by 20%, to a maximum of 120%.
13.longDescription: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 80%. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase this bonus by 20%, to a maximum of 120%.

13.name: Cruelty
13.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.
13.longDescription: Stunning an enemy with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.
16.longDescription: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.
16.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.
20.longDescription: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.
20.longDescription: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10.00% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 142 damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Black Soulstone
abilities.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.Type: Health multiplierScaling:  -Affects: Self

abilities.name: Shadow Charge
abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 120 damage.Type: Damage / Mobility: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Knockback, Movement Speed buff, Stun (conditional)Cast time: InstantRange: 7Knockback range: 5Shadow Charge can be interrupted via Stuns, Roots and Knockbacks.Diablo is able to see collision edges of terrain in 18 radius.

abilities.name: Fire Stomp
abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 damage each. Once they reach maximum range, they return dealing an additional 36 damage. Diablo heals for 130% of the damage dealt to Heroes.Type: Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, ClampingCast time: 0.2+0 secondsReturn delay: 0.5 secondsRange: 10.5Projectile radius: 0.66Wave spacing: 20 degreesHealing is calculated after damage modifiers, like Armor reductions.Fire Stomp waves return towards Diablos current location.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Stationary channel, StunCast time: 0.5625 secondsCast time: 0.0625+Ch+0.0625 secondsRange: 1Displacement range: 2

abilities.name: Apocalypse
abilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and Stunning for 1.75 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Delayed, StunCast time: 0.2+0 secondsRange: Global Radius: 2.5

abilities.name: Lightning Breath
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 40 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Cursor trackingProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Stationary channel, Slow, UnstoppableChannel time: 4 secondsCast time: 0.5625+Ch+0 secondsRange: 12.5Width: 3Tick rate: 4 / second (x16)Reactivate: Cancel Lightning Breath - Cancels Lightning BreathUnstoppable is granted immediately, damage and Slow start after the windup of 0.5625 seconds.If Diablo dies or is put in Stasis during the windup, Lightning Breath is put on a 10-second cooldown.

1.name: Bonds of Justice
1.description: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15. Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75. Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15. Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75. Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

1.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
1.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.50 seconds.
1.longDescription: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Naisha's Memento
1.description: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.
1.longDescription: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

4.name: Pin Down
4.description: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 15%. Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%. Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 15%. Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%. Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

4.name: Blade Dance
4.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 52 Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.
4.longDescription: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

4.name: Sudden Vengeance
4.description: Using Blink within 0.35 seconds of Spirit of Vengeance hitting an enemy Hero causes the shadow to explode, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 5% of their maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Using Blink within 0.35 seconds of Spirit of Vengeance hitting an enemy Hero causes the shadow to explode, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 5% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Elune's Wrath
7.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 80 damage when it impacts.
7.longDescription: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 damage when it impacts.

7.name: Bonds of Corruption
7.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Physical Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Physical Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Ruthless Spirit
7.description: Spirit of Vengeance's damage is increased by 3% per Minion, Mercenary, or enemy Summon hit, and 24% per enemy Hero hit.
7.longDescription: Spirit of Vengeance's damage is increased by 3% per Minion, Mercenary, or enemy Summon hit, and 24% per enemy Hero hit.

10.name: Containment Disc
10.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.
10.longDescription: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

10.name: Warden's Cage
10.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

13.name: Bladed Armor
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5.0 seconds, up to 20 Armor.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

13.name: Chain Gang
13.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shadow Armor
13.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.00 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.
13.longDescription: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Cruel Chain
16.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.50 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.
16.longDescription: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

16.name: Vengeful Knives
16.description: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.50% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.
16.longDescription: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.5% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

16.name: Armored Assault
16.description: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.
16.longDescription: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. 
Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

4.description: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.
4.longDescription: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

7.name: Jumper
7.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increases Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increase Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Bullet Time
7.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.

7.name: Spatial Echo
7.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.
7.longDescription: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.
10.longDescription: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

13.name: Bullet Spray
13.description: Increases Melee's radius by 32%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.
13.longDescription: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

13.name: Ricochet
13.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.
13.longDescription: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

13.name: Leeching Rounds
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

16.name: Sleight of Hand
16.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.
16.longDescription: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

16.name: Focus Fire
16.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 95 bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.
16.longDescription: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

16.name: Locked and Loaded
16.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.
16.longDescription: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.
20.longDescription: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.
20.longDescription: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.
20.longDescription: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

abilities.name: Reload
abilities.description: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.75 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.Tracer's effective attack speed with Reload is 5.0/s.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Charge Cooldown: 9 secondsDash towards an area. Stores up to 3 charges.

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Tracer returns to the position she was at 3 seconds ago, refilling her ammo, and removing all negative status effects from herself.Tracer is put in Stasis for 0.75 seconds, removing most debuffs and making her untargetable and immune to damage.The destination of Recall is visible to enemy Heroes

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to an enemy, if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 360 (+6% per level) damage to them and 180 (+6% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.The ability is available from the start of the game as long as you have enough charge to activate it.Emptying one clip grants total of  6% charge regardless of damage dealt or the enemy.Enemies that walk over the middle of the bomb are considered primary targets and take the same damage as if the bomb was attached to them.

1.name: Rejuvenation
1.description: Malfurion gains 100% base Health regeneration for every active Regrowth.
1.longDescription: Malfurion regenerates 5 Health per second for every active Regrowth.

1.name: Celestial Alignment
1.description: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.
1.longDescription: Increases Moonfire's reveal duration by 1 second. Malfurion's basic attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

1.name: Shan'do's Clarity
1.description: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.
1.longDescription: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

4.name: Strangling Vines
4.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

4.name: Deep Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 25% longer.
4.longDescription: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger and persist on the ground 25% longer.

4.name: Vengeful Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 65 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.
4.longDescription: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 65 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's damage per second by 7.

7.name: Wild Growth
7.description: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

7.name: Tenacious Roots
7.description: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 0.3 seconds. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 0.3 seconds. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots instantly resets. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

7.name: Nature's Cure
7.description: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.
7.longDescription: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 83 Health per second for 16 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.
10.longDescription: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: After 0.50 seconds, deal 322 damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

13.name: Nature's Swiftness
13.description: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.
13.longDescription: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed per ally Hero affected by Regrowth.

13.name: Hindering Moonfire
13.description: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Moonfire Slows enemy Heroes by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Revitalize
13.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

16.name: Ysera's Gift
16.description: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.
16.longDescription: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

16.name: Nature's Balance
16.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25.0% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

16.name: Moonlit Harmony
16.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.
20.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Astral Communion
20.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

20.name: Lifebloom
20.description: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.
20.longDescription: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

20.name: Lunar Shower
20.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.
20.longDescription: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown its reduces by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

abilities.name: Innervate
abilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonfire
abilities.description: Deal 90 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.Allies with an active Regrowth are healed for 130 (+4% per level) Health for each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Root enemy Heroes in a area for 1.25 seconds, and deals 117 (+4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Tranquility
abilities.description: Heals nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affect by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

abilities.name: Twilight Dream
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

1.name: Caduceus Feedback
1.description: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.
1.longDescription: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

1.name: Life Support
1.description: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.
1.longDescription: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

1.name: Clear!
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 3 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

4.name: Cellular Reactor

4.longDescription: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

4.description: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.This effect has a 30 second cooldown.
4.longDescription: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

4.name: Blast Shield
4.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

7.name: Physical Therapy
7.description: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target. When a Slow is removed this way, reduce the cooldown of Safeguard by 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target. When a Slow is removed this way, reduce the cooldown of Safeguard by 4 seconds.

7.name: Vanadium Plating
7.description: While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned, Safeguard grants an additional 25 Armor and its duration is paused.
7.longDescription: While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned, Safeguard grants an additional 25 Armor and its duration is paused.

7.name: Prolonged Safeguard
7.description: Increase Safeguard's duration by 50%.
7.longDescription: Increase Safeguard's duration by 50%.

10.name: Stim Drone
10.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

10.name: Medivac Dropship
10.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 11 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.
10.longDescription: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

13.name: EMP Grenade
13.description: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 83 damage over 2 seconds, and up to 416 bonus damage to Shields.
13.longDescription: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 40 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

13.name: System Shock
13.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

13.name: Second Opinion
13.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

16.name: Extended Care
16.description: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30.0%.
16.longDescription: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

16.name: First Responder
16.description: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.
16.longDescription: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

16.name: Shield Sequencer
16.description: Safeguard gains a second charge. These charges cannot stack on a single target.
16.longDescription: Safeguard gains a second charge.

20.name: Hyperactivity
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

20.name: Safe Zone
20.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2.0 seconds.
20.longDescription: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

20.name: Reinforcements
20.description: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.
20.longDescription: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.

20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
20.description: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.
20.longDescription: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

abilities.name: Caduceus Reactor
abilities.description: When channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

abilities.name: Healing Beam
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 180 (200 + 4% per level) health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second. Reactivate to switch targets. Self-cast or activate your Trait to cancel the channel.

abilities.name: Redirect Healing Beam
abilities.description: Redirect Healing Beam to another target. Use on self to cancel channeling.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Grant target Ally 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Displacement Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

abilities.name: Stim Drone
abilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Medivac Dropship
abilities.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

1.name: Silver Touch
1.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Wave of Light
1.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1.0 second.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 second.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
1.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.50 seconds.Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.50% of Uther's maximum Mana.
1.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 second.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

4.name: Holy Shock
4.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.
4.longDescription: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

4.name: Pursuit of Justice
4.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Holy Fire
4.description: Deal 14 damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.
4.longDescription: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

7.name: Armor of Faith
7.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200.000% faster for 6.0 seconds.
7.longDescription: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

7.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
7.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.
7.longDescription: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.

7.name: Hand of Protection
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

10.name: Divine Shield
10.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3.00 seconds.
10.longDescription: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Divine Storm
10.description: Deal 177 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Champion
13.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.
13.longDescription: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

13.name: Well Met
13.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3.0 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3.0 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Beacon of Light
16.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.
16.longDescription: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

16.name: Tyr's Deliverance
16.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.
16.longDescription: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

16.name: Benediction
16.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Bulwark of Light
20.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Divine Hurricane
20.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Redemption
20.description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.This effect has a 180 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

20.name: Divine Protection
20.description: Applying Devotion to a Hero that is already affected by Devotion increases their Armor by an additional 15.
20.longDescription: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.

abilities.name: Eternal Devotion
abilities.description: Heroes healed by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 15 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself. Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 362 (+4% per level) Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Flash of Light
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 242 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 177 (+4% per level) Health, dealing 177 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 109 (+4% per level) damage and stun the target for 0.75 seconds.Cannot target Structures.

abilities.name: Divine Shield
abilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Divine Storm
abilities.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

1.name: Immolation
1.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 23 damage a second for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Battered Assault

1.longDescription: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

1.longDescription: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

4.longDescription: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

4.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

4.longDescription: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.
7.longDescription: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Thirsting Blade

7.longDescription: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
7.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25.00% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 48 damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 208 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.
10.longDescription: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 200 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 261 damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.
10.longDescription: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.description: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
13.longDescription: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3.0 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.
13.longDescription: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.
13.longDescription: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.description: Dive deals an extra 187 damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.
20.longDescription: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.
20.longDescription: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Betrayer's Thirst
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.Getting Blinded makes you inable to hit enemies and gain cooldown reduction.

abilities.name: Dive
abilities.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases your Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 200 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.While performing the transformation, Illidan is removed from the battlefield for 1.25 seconds making him Untargetable and immune to damage.Bonus health is calculated and damage is dealt when transfomation period ends and Illidan reappears on the battlefield.Illidan's current health is increased by the same flat amount as his maximum health. Current health is not reduced once Metamorphosis ends.Removes Root, Slow, Blind and Armor debuffs on cast, but not Damage over Time effects, Revealed status or hero-specific debuffs like Jaina's "Chill".

abilities.name: The Hunt
abilities.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.Has 1 second cast time that is interruptable with Stuns and Silences.After the cast period, Illidan is Unstoppable, until he hits his target.Cannot target structures.

1.name: Longshot
1.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

1.name: Covert Ops
1.description: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.
1.longDescription: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

1.name: Advanced Cloaking
1.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 5% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.
1.longDescription: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 5% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

4.name: Rapid Projection
4.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.
4.longDescription: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

4.name: Holo Stability
4.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Holo Decoy by 100.0%.
4.longDescription: Increases the cast range, sight range, and duration of Holo Decoy by 100%.

4.name: Covert Mission
4.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
4.longDescription: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

7.name: Perfect Shot
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds and grants an additional stack of Snipe.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds and grants an additional damage stack of Snipe.

7.name: One in the Chamber
7.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.

7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
7.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.
7.longDescription: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

10.name: Triple Tap
10.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 387 damage each.
10.longDescription: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 452 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.name: Psionic Efficiency
13.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15%, and hitting a Hero with Snipe refunds its Mana cost.
13.longDescription: Snipe's range is increased by 15%, and hitting a Hero with Snipe refunds its Mana cost.

13.name: Double Tap
13.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges but it's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Ionic Force Field
13.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.
13.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

16.name: Explosive Round
16.description: Snipe also deals 70.0% damage to enemies near the impact.
16.longDescription: Snipe also deals 70% damage to enemies near the impact.

16.name: Crippling Shot
16.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.
16.longDescription: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.description: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30.0% of Nova's damage.
16.longDescription: Holo Decoy deals 30% of Nova's damage.

20.name: Fast Reload
20.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.
20.longDescription: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

20.name: Precision Barrage
20.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its coodown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apollo Suit
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak from by 2 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's normal damage.
