1.name: Salvation
1.description: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 25% and heal Tyrael for 146 Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.
1.longDescription: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 25% and heal Tyrael for 140 Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

1.longDescription: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

1.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 15 Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.

4.name: Stalwart Angel

4.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.

4.longDescription: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

4.longDescription: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.description: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 177 damage to nearby enemies.
7.longDescription: When Righteousness expires, it explodes for 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Purge Evil

7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 45% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Swift Retribution
7.description: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 156 damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 78 damage.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Sword of Justice
13.description: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.
13.longDescription: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

13.name: Holy Ground
13.description: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.
13.longDescription: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

13.name: Law and Order
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.

16.name: Horadric Reforging
16.description: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Burning Halo
16.description: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 19 damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: While El'Druin's Might is active, both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 damage per second to nearby enemies. For 2 seconds after teleporting, Tyrael continues to deal this damage and the damage amount is increased by 150%.

16.name: Smite the Wicked
16.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.
16.longDescription: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

20.longDescription: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

20.longDescription: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

1.name: Ranger

1.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Hitting Heroes with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 3%. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Lunar Flare no longer has a Mana cost. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

4.longDescription: Light of Elune removes Stuns and Silences from its target. When a Stun or Silence is removed this way, Light of Elune may be used for free within 4 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Celestial Attunement.

7.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Hunter's Mark by 50%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby Heroes and Mercenaries.

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 5% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

7.longDescription: Passively grant 10% increased Attack Damage to nearby allied Heroes. Activate to double this bonus for 5 seconds.

10.description: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

10.description: Deal 92 damage per second and slow enemies by 20.0% in an area. Lasts 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.longDescription: Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 2 seconds. Every time it hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by an additional 4 seconds.

13.longDescription: Sentinel Slows the target by 25% and reduces their damage dealt by 25% for 4 seconds.

16.longDescription: While Tyrande is above 60% Health, Light of Elune's healing is increased by 30%.

16.longDescription: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 5 seconds.

20.name: Eyes of the Huntress

20.longDescription: After casting Shadowstalk, reveal all enemy Heroes for 3 seconds.

20.name: Celestial Wrath

20.longDescription: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes hit.

20.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Every 10 Basic Attack against Heroes casts a free Lunar Flare at a random Hero near Tyrande's position.

20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

abilities.description: Reveal a target enemy and lower their Armor by 25 for 4 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%. Cannot be used on Structures.

abilities.name: Dragonqueen
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health. While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Abilities are empowered, her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her, and the duration of incoming Slows, Roots, Blinds, and Stuns is reduced by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds.Dragonqueen grants Alexstrasza a different set of Basic Abilities, which have independent cooldowns and are unaffected by Alexstrasza's Talents that enhance her regular Basic Abilities.Dragonqueen's cooldown starts when the ability is successfully cast.Dragonqueen reduces attack speed to 0.80, resulting in increase of single-target Basic Attack DPS by roughly 57%.Dragonqueen increases Alexstrasza's Basic Attack range to 9 and makes them cleave in a 50° arc in front of her.When the ability is successfully cast, and upon transformation back to human form, Alexstrasza enters a special Stasis for 0.5 seconds, removing debuffs and becoming invulnerable and untargetable for this period.

abilities.name: Gift of Life
abilities.description: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an ally for 150% of that amount.Dragonqueen: Breath of LifeCooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

abilities.name: Breath of Life
abilities.description: Heal an Ally for 20% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

abilities.name: Abundance
abilities.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health.Dragonqueen: PreservationHeal area and amount greatly increased.

abilities.name: Preservation
abilities.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 30% of their maximum Health.

abilities.name: Flame Buffet
abilities.description: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 damage over 5.5 seconds.Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.Dragonqueen: Wing BuffetDamage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

abilities.name: Wing Buffet
abilities.description: Deal 162 damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Life-Binder
abilities.description: Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 600 over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.Life-Binder is "interrupted" if either of the two linked Heroes dies, becomes Time Stopped, enters a vehicle, or otherwise "leaves" the battlefield. When this happens it goes on a 10 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Cleansing Flame
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop fireballs at the position of your mouse cursor every 1.2 seconds for 6 seconds. Each fireball restores 300 Health to nearby allied Heroes, and deals 135 damage to nearby enemies. 2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of your mouse cursor.Interrupting Cleansing Flame during its cast period puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Cleansing Flame's cooldown starts when the ability is cast.Dragonqueen's duration is paused during Cleansing Flame but her cooldowns are not.

abilities.name: Misha, Focus!
abilities.description: Passive:Misha gains 15% move speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.Type: -Targeting: Point target / Unit targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRadius: GlobalMishaType: SummonProperties: Heroic PetStatistics: Data:MishaSight radius: 7Leash radius: 17.25Killing Misha rewards a Takedown credit and 0.25 Hero kills/XP.Killing Rexxar rewards a Takedown credit and 0.75 Hero kills/XP, when Misha is dead. If Misha is alive while Rexxar is killed, she dies as well, totaling a full Hero kill/XP.Rexxar becomes is unable to control Misha, while he is unable to act (Stunned, Dazed or put in Time Stop or Stasis, other than Feign Death) or Silenced.If Rexxar enters a vehicle or is some other way removed from the battleground, Misha will be removed from the Battleground as well.Issuing Move and Attack commands to Misha doesn't break channels, using abilities will.Rexxar and Misha share the effects of Healing Fountains and Regeneration Globes.

abilities.name: Minigun

Cooldown starts when the duration ends.

Can move and use Abilities while channeling.Deals 46 damage to the primary target and 23 damage to the secondary targets every 0.33 seconds.

abilities.name: Thrusters

abilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. This makes its effective duration 20 seconds.Drakken Laser Drill has 1255 (+4% per level) Health.Cooldown starts when the ability is cast.

abilities.name: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.It takes Tychus 2.75 seconds to enter the Odin, during which Tychus is Unstoppable. Armor bonus is instant.While piloting Odin, Tychus' Basic attack damage is set to 191 (+4% per level) and Attack Speed to 1.00/s.Tychus cannot use Minigun and Sizzling Attacks while piloting Odin.Odin's attack speed benefits from Master Assassin talent.Odin's Abilities use no mana.Cooldown starts when the ability is cast.

abilities.name: Go for the Throat
abilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) total damage. abilities.name: Cursed Bullet

abilities.name: Cyber Agility
abilities.description: Activate to jump to target area.Can go over walls and terrain.

abilities.name: Deflect

Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.Damage over time effects and Abilities that deal periodic damage proc Deflect on every tick of damage.If the channel gets interrupted by a Stun or a Silence, the damage of the Ability that caused the interruption still gets deflected.

abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 2 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.Can go over walls and terrain. Trying to dash into a middle of terrain ends the dash at the edge of terrain closest to destination point.

abilities.name: X-Strike
abilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.Slashes are aligned 45 degrees to both sides from the direction Genji is facing, first slash hitting towards his right hand side. Genji turns before ability is cast.For the duration of the slash animation, Genji is put in a special Stasis, removing most debuffs and making him untargetable and immune to damage.Self-casting the ability makes Genji move forward a bit.

1.name: Winds of Celerity
1.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

1.name: Raven’s Intellect
1.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.
1.longDescription: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

1.name: Portal Mastery
1.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form. Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.
1.longDescription: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

4.name: Mage Armor
4.description: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 25 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 25%.
4.longDescription: The first time an Ally uses a Portal, they gain 25 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 25%.

4.name: Raven Familiar
4.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 119 damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.50 seconds.
4.longDescription: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Dust of Appearance
4.description: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.
4.longDescription: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

7.name: Mystic Assault
7.description: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% more damage and heals for 40% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% more damage and Heals for 40% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Arcane Explosion
7.description: When Force of Will expires, it deals 83 damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 328 additional damage.
7.longDescription: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 additional damage.

7.name: Force of Magic
7.description: Preventing at least 279 damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 25%  Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.
7.longDescription: Preventing at least 268 damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 25% Spell Power for 15 seconds. This can stack up to 2 times.

10.name: Poly Bomb
10.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2.0 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.
10.longDescription: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Ley Line Seal
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

13.name: Circle of Protection
13.description: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Enduring Will
13.description: Preventing at least 279 damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 3.00 seconds.
13.longDescription: Preventing at least 268 damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 3 seconds.

13.name: Reabsorption
13.description: Increase the amount of healing from Force Of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.
13.longDescription: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

16.name: Arcane Charge
16.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.
16.longDescription: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

16.name: Temporal Flux
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 1 second. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 1 second. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.name: Stable Portal
16.description: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25.00% and increase Portal duration by 50%.
16.longDescription: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
20.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.
20.longDescription: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

20.name: Medivh Cheats!
20.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
20.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.
20.longDescription: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

20.name: Arcane Brilliance
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

20.name: Dust of Disappearance
20.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.Stores up to 2 charges.
20.longDescription: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Raven Form
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

abilities.name: Arcane Rift
abilities.description: Launch a rift that deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.❢  Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.❢ Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds. Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target 20% of the damage it absorbed.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Poly Bomb
abilities.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Ley Line Seal
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

1.name: Put Some English On It
1.description: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.
1.longDescription: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
1.description: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.
1.longDescription: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

1.name: Bouncy Bouncy
1.description: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.
1.longDescription: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.

4.name: Taste For Explosions
4.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.50, up to 100.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.5, up to 100.

4.name: Bonzer Hits
4.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine. Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine. Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.

4.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
4.description: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap. Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap. Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.

7.name: Tricky Shuffles
7.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.
7.longDescription: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Big As
7.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.
7.longDescription: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

7.name: Sticky Wicket
7.description: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90.00% for 3.50 seconds.
7.longDescription: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90% for 3.5 seconds.

10.name: RIP-Tire
10.description: Create a motorized bomb with 551 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 494, 650, or 806 damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).
10.longDescription: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475 (+4% per level), 625 (+4% per level), or 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

10.name: Rocket Ride
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 780 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.5 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.name: Ripper Air
13.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.
13.longDescription: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

13.name: Bogged Down
13.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.
13.longDescription: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

13.name: Chattering Teeth
13.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.
13.longDescription: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

16.name: Burst Fire
16.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.
16.longDescription: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.name: Endless Nades
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Spread Volley
16.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.
16.longDescription: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph
20.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Puckish Scamp
20.description: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 70 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 70 seconds.

20.name: Cannonball!
20.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.
20.longDescription: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by -98.5%.

20.name: BOOM POW
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem
abilities.description: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 damage to nearby enemies. Does 75% less damage to Structures.Detonate MineDetonate an active Concussion MineBasic Attacks deal 100% splash damage in 2 radius.Basic Abilities can be used while moving.

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 128 damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures. Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.There is 0.5 seconds cooldown inbetween charges.If the grenade lands on unpathable terrain, it explodes immediately without bouncing.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.Limit 1 active mine.The mine is invulnerable and untargetable and lasts indefinitely until detonation or placing another one.This ability knocks the targets hit into the air, making them fly over terrain.Distance of the knockback depends of how far is the target hit from the center of the ability's Area of Effect, with the longest being the farthest.Targets are knocked in air for 0.75-1.0 seconds depending on the launch distance.Concussion Mine provides vision in 3 radius.

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.Limit 1 active trap.The trap is invulnerable and untargetable and lasts indefinitely until triggering or placing another one.Steel Trap provides vision in 5 radius.

abilities.name: RIP-Tire
abilities.description: Create a motorized bomb with with 530 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.RIP-Tire Can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475, 625, or 775 damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).RIP-Tire does not detonate if destroyed or expired.If Junkrat's channel gets interrupted, RIP-Tire instantly expires without detonating.Duration of crowd control effects against RIP-Tire are reduced by 75%.Detonating RIP-Tire deals high damage below 1.5 radius, mid damage in 1.5 - 4 radius and low damage in 4 - 6 radius.

abilities.name: Rocket Ride
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving. After 3.5 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.Junkrat is put in a special Stasis state for the duration of Rocket Ride, removing most debuffs, and making him immune to damage.

abilities.name: Jump
abilities.description: Activate to make RIP-Tire jump. Can be used to pass over terrain and Structures.This ability is available while controlling RIP-Tire.

1.name: Spine Launcher
1.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.50 seconds, but deal 40.00% less damage.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

1.name: Fetid Touch
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pusule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

1.name: Poppin' Pustules
1.description: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.50 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 100% and applies its damage and Slow in an area.
1.longDescription: Detonating a Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 100% and applies its damage and Slow in an area.

4.name: One Good Spread...
4.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2.0 seconds.
4.longDescription: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

4.name: Biotic Armor
4.description: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus by 35 for 2.50 seconds.
4.longDescription: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to its targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus by 35 for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
4.description: Quest: Detonate 50 Healing Pathogens with Bio-Kill Switch. Reward: Increase Bio-Kill Switch's healing by 40.00%.
4.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 25% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

7.name: Growing Infestation
7.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds but its cooldown is increased by 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

7.name: The Long Pitch
7.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 100%.
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

7.name: Targeted Excision
7.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.

7.name: Within My Reach
7.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 50.0%.
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 50.0%.

10.name: Flailing Swipe
10.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.
10.longDescription: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

10.name: Massive Shove
10.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 198 damage and Stunning them for 0.50 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.
10.longDescription: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 190 (+4% per level) damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

13.name: Low Blow
13.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30.00% Health.
13.longDescription: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

13.name: It Hungers
13.description: Each time an enemy Hero is hit by Lurking Arm, reduce its cooldown by 0.50 seconds, up to 6.5 seconds, and restore 10 Mana.
13.longDescription: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 15 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

13.name: Reactive Ballistospores
13.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

13.name: Lingering Spines
13.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.50 seconds after it is canceled.
13.longDescription: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

13.name: Virulent Reaction
13.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

16.name: Superstrain
16.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 260 Health.
16.longDescription: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

16.name: Universal Carrier
16.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50.00%.
16.longDescription: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50%.

16.name: Pox Populi
16.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

20.name: Controlled Chaos
20.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.
20.longDescription: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range. Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

20.name: Push Comes To Shove
20.description: Massive Shove slows its target by 50% for 5 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.
20.longDescription: Massive Shove slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Top Off
20.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.
20.longDescription: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
20.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2.0 seconds.
20.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Bio-Kill Switch
abilities.description: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 450 health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.Can be cast while channeling Lurking Arm.

abilities.name: Healing Pathogen
abilities.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 222 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds, and a single Healing Pathogen can spread to each allied Hero 1 time.Can cast it on self, and spread to self.Cannot spread to targets to whom it has already spread.

abilities.name: Weighted Pustule
abilities.description: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 damage upon expiring or being removed.

abilities.name: Lurking Arm
abilities.description: Channel at a target location, creating an area that Silences enemies inside and deals 136 damage per second to them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.Deals 4 ticks of 34 damage per second. Each tick applies 0.3 seconds Silence.Does not damage Structures.

abilities.name: Massive Shove
abilities.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 190 damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.Enemy Heroes are revealed as long as they being shoved.Enemy Heroes that collide with terrain are stunned for 0.5 seconds.Massive Shove gets cancelled if the arm collides with terrain before hitting a Hero.

abilities.name: Flailing Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

1.name: Vigor
1.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 2.5 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.
1.longDescription: Valeera regenerates an additional 2.5 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

1.name: Subtlety
1.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 8 Energy per second for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 8 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

1.name: Combat Readiness
1.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Crippling Poison
1.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.
1.longDescription: Activate to cause Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

4.name: Relentless Strikes
4.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.
4.longDescription: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

4.name: Hemorrhage
4.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 30% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.
4.longDescription: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 30% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

4.name: Initiative
4.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 2 Combo Points.
4.longDescription: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 1 Combo Points.

4.name: Wound Poison
4.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.
4.longDescription: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

7.name: Mutilate
7.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.
7.longDescription: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

7.name: Fatal Finesse
7.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 4, up to 80. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.
7.longDescription: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 4, up to 80. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

7.name: Slice and Dice
7.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150.00% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.
7.longDescription: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

10.name: Smoke Bomb

10.name: Dragonstrike
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 73 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 150% damage.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 70 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area. Enemies in the center take 150% damage.

10.name: Dragon's Arrow
10.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 135 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 270 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 406 and the Stun duration to 2.0 seconds.
10.longDescription:
Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 100 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 200 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds. 
After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 350 and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

13.name: Fleet of Foot
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ninja Assassin
13.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.
13.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

13.name: Mounted Archery
13.description: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.
13.longDescription: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

16.name: Flawless Technique
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 25%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 25%.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 25%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 25%.

16.name: Piercing Arrows
16.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.
16.longDescription: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

16.name: Giant Slayer
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 1.50% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 1.5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: The Dragon Awakens
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.

20.name: Play of the Game
20.description: While in flight or for up to 2.0 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 137 damage to each target hit by the impact.Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.
20.longDescription: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 137 damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

20.name: Bullseye
20.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

20.name: Perfect Agility
20.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown by reduced by 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Natural Agility
abilities.description: Target unpathable terrain or a Structure to jump to the other side of it.Type: Mobility: LaunchAffects: SelfTargeting: Automatic (unpathable terrain)/ Point TargetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 9Natural Agility can't be used, if there is no unpathatble terrain between Hanzo and target point, or if there are no viable landing spots in range.Hanzo can't use Natural Agility to jump over player-created objects or friendly Gate.Hanzo always lands 2 range from the edge of the terrain, regardless of its width.

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled. Reactivate to fire.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point TargetProperties: Channeled cast (mobile), Clamping, SkillshotChannel time (max range): 1.25 secondsCast time: 0+Ch+0 secondsMinimum range: 6Maximum range: 13Storm Bow can be channeled indefinitely, but range increase is limited.Cooldown starts once Storm Bow is reactivated.

abilities.name: Scatter Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 88 to the first enemy Hero hit. Scatter Arrow can collide with terrain and Structures, splitting into 5 arrows that travel extra distance, ricochet up to 4 additional times, and deal 88 damage each to the first enemy hit.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes (initial projectile) / Enemies (bounces)Targeting: Point TargetProperties: Clamping, SkillshotCast time: InstantRange: 16Bounce range: 16Scatter spacing: 9 degreesHanzo is able to the collision edges of terrain in 16 radius.Scatter Arrow doesn't bounce off of friendly Gate.

abilities.description: Fire an arrow that grants vision in a large area for 8 seconds. Enemies inside are revealed for 1 second. If Sonic Arrow lands directly on an enemy, it deals 150 damage to them and follows them as they move.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point TargetProperties: Area of Effect, RevealedCast time: InstantRange: 20Impact radius: 0.5Vision radius: 7Duration: 5 seconds

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 40% and duration by 40%.
1.longDescription: Increases Locust's Health by 40% and duration by 40%.

1.name: Regenerative Microbes
1.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 71 Health per second over 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 68 (+4% per level) Health per second over 4 seconds.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.
4.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

4.name: Ballistospores
4.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.
4.longDescription: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

4.name: Sustained Carapace
4.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40.00% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.
4.longDescription: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25.00% increased Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

7.name: Needlespine
7.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.
7.longDescription: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.
7.longDescription: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.
7.longDescription: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20.00 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.
10.longDescription: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
10.longDescription: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

13.name: Assault Strain
13.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 102 damage.
13.longDescription: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 102 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.
13.longDescription: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 67 Health per enemy Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.
16.longDescription: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 142 damage to nearby enemies every 3.00 seconds and when they die.
16.longDescription: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25.00% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.
20.longDescription: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.
20.longDescription: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

abilities.name: Locust Strain
abilities.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds, have 316 health and deal 34 damage with each Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.Allied and enemy Symbiote hosts display a crown icon above their portraits on the Minimap.Symbiote will be paused if the allied target enters a Stasis effect. Symbiote can still be cancelled in these situations, but no Symbiote Abilities can be used

abilities.name: Stab
abilities.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 119 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

abilities.name: Toxic Nest
abilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.

abilities.name: Spike Burst
abilities.description: Deals 120 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Carapace
abilities.description: Shields the assisted ally for 157 (+4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity
abilities.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

abilities.name: Ultimate Evolution
abilities.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

abilities.name: Deep Tunnel
abilities.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location Deep Tunnel goes on a 10 second cooldown when interrupted by enemy or allied abilities, including self-cancelling.Deep Tunnel has an allied chat announcement upon activation.

1.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain 100.00% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

1.name: Endurance Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 468 damage over 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 450 damage over 5 seconds.

1.name: Neural Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain 50 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

1.name: New Habits
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 5 seconds. Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 5 seconds. Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

4.name: Feeding the Flame
4.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Adhesive Petroleum
4.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30.0% for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Oil Dispersal
4.description: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20.00% and Slow amount by 10.0%.
4.longDescription: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20% and Slow amount by 10%.

4.name: Meltdown
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 5.00% for 2.5 seconds, up to 30.0%.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 5% for 2.5 seconds, up to 30%.

7.name: Crossfire
7.description: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 145 bonus damage.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 bonus damage.

7.name: Grill and Kill
7.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times. Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.
7.longDescription: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times. Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

7.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
7.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15.00%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.
7.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

10.name: Bunker Drop
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1492 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 186 damage to enemies in a line. Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2.0 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1300 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 179 damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

10.name: Combustion
10.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60.0% and deal 54 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1.0 second up to 5 seconds.Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 52 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.

13.name: Suppressive Fire
13.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 20% for 4 seconds, up to 40%.
13.longDescription: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 20% for 4 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Nanomachine Coating
13.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 40.0% for 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Fuel Leak
13.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.
13.longDescription: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

16.name: Thermal Protection
16.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3% seconds and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

16.name: Heat Treatment
16.description: Heal for 75.0% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.
16.longDescription: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

16.name: Juggernaut Plating
16.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage reduced by Juggernaut Plating.

20.name: Fortified Bunker
20.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

20.name: Flash Fire
20.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60.0%.
20.longDescription: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%

20.name: Burn Notice
20.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5.0% and deal an additional 19 damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Blaze alternates the hand he uses to attack.

1.name: Consuming Fire
1.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150.00% more when a Hero is Ignited.
1.longDescription: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

1.name: Fuel for the Flame
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.30%. Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%. Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

1.name: Calloused Hide
1.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.
1.longDescription: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

4.name: Uppercut
4.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.
4.longDescription: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

4.name: Rollback
4.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.
4.longDescription: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

4.longDescription: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

7.longDescription: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds.

7.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

7.longDescription: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

10.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 157 damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

10.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 182 damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Frenzied Fists
13.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.
13.longDescription: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

13.name: Runic Feedback

13.longDescription: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

13.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Surging Dash
16.description: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 Health per second.
16.longDescription: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

16.name: Molten Block
16.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 96 damage per second.
16.longDescription: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

20.name: C'Thun's Gift
20.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
20.description: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.50 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: The Will of Cho
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.
20.longDescription: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

20.name: Hour of Twilight
20.description: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.
20.longDescription: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

abilities.name: Ogre Hide
abilities.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

abilities.name: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

abilities.name: Consuming Blaze
abilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

abilities.name: Rune Bomb
abilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 221 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

abilities.name: Hammer of Twilight
abilities.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and stuning them for 0.75 seconds. Passive:Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

1.name: Keep Moving!
1.description: Increases the duration of Shove's movement speed bonus by 1.00 second. Cho's Basic Attacks against Heroes increases the duration of an active Shove by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increases the duration of Shove's movement speed bonus by 1 second. Cho's Basic Attacks against Heroes increases the duration of an active Shove by 1 second.

1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Shove by 10 seconds. Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the Cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

1.longDescription: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 15 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

4.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 187 damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.
4.longDescription: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

4.longDescription: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

7.name: Edge of Madness
7.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 4 seconds.

7.name: Double Trouble
7.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1.0 second.
7.longDescription: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1 second.

10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley

10.longDescription: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

10.longDescription: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

13.longDescription: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

13.longDescription: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

16.longDescription: Shadowflame slows enemy Heroes by 10% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

16.description: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.5 seconds.

16.description: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Shadowfury

20.longDescription: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

20.longDescription: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins channeling.

20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.
20.longDescription: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

abilities.name: Ogre Rage
abilities.description: Activate to increase Gall's damage by 25%, but reduce Cho's armor by 25.Passive: Gall is permanently immune to Stun and Silence effects.

abilities.name: Shadowflame
abilities.description: Deal 135 (+5% per level) damage to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Dread Orb
abilities.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 119 (+5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 221 (+4% per level) damage around it.

abilities.name: Twisting Nether
abilities.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
abilities.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 226 (108 + 4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

abilities.name: Eye of Kilrogg
abilities.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.description: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

1.name: Psi-Infusion
1.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20.00%

1.name: Templar's Will
1.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

4.longDescription: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

4.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 15 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 15% less damage.

7.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

7.longDescription: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.
