7.longDescription: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 164 damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 82 damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 11 seconds.Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.
10.longDescription: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

10.longDescription: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

13.longDescription: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

20.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

20.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

20.longDescription: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.

20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

abilities.name: Oracle
abilities.description: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds.Passive: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Distortion Beam that slows enemy units by 20%.

abilities.name: Plasma Shield
abilities.description: Grant a Shield that absorbs 455 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. Heroes gain 40% Life Steal from Basic Attacks while Shielded.

abilities.name: Psionic Storm
abilities.description: Deal 82 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 12% for each consecutive instance of damage, up to 60%.

abilities.name: Dimensional Shift
abilities.description: Tassadar becomes invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Archon
abilities.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

abilities.name: Force Wall
abilities.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

1.name: Mounting Sand
1.description: Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increase the damage of Echo's Sand Blast by 40%. Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gather 15.0 Regeneration Globes. Reward: After gathering 15.0 Globes, Chromie gains 5.00% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.
1.longDescription: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 5% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.

4.description: Increase Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.
4.longDescription: Increase Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.

4.description: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talons to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.
4.longDescription: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talons to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.

4.longDescription: Increase Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

4.longDescription: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

7.longDescription: If Dragon's Breath's hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 50 Mana.

7.description: Dragon’s Breath deals 25% more damage to enemies in the center.
7.longDescription: Dragon's Breath deals 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

7.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 35.00% for 4.00 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.
10.longDescription: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

13.name: Bye Bye!
13.description: Reduce the cast time of Hearthstone by 75.00%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.
13.longDescription: Reduce the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.
13.longDescription: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.
13.longDescription: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 20% for 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 10 seconds.

20.name: Pocket of Time
20.description: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.
20.longDescription: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.
20.longDescription: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant Quest progress.
20.longDescription: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant bonus damage or Quest progress.

20.name: Andorhal Anomaly
20.description: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.
20.longDescription: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

abilities.name: Timewalker
abilities.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!Brozen TalonsHitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability increases the damage of Chromie's next Basic Attack by 100%.

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 300 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.❢  Quest: Hit 5 Heroes with Sand Blast. Consecutive hits without missing count as hitting 2 Heroes.❢ Reward: After hitting 50 Heroes, Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind. The next time Sand Blast is cast, the Echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that deals 40% damage.

abilities.name: Dragon's Breath
abilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 360 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

abilities.name: Slowing Sands
abilities.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Temporal Loop
abilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.
